title: Silly Autovest Dude

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Give a player an autovest of any of the following defense values. You may only choose each once. Your autovests trigger before any other autovests.
> - Overprotective
> - Invincible
> - Powerful
> - Basic
> - Aura
> - Hellbent
> - None
> - Vulnerable

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You have an Overprotective, an Invincible, a Powerful, and a Basic autovest. They trigger in that order.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see the Town lose the game.

desc:
Post 2955
*A layer of X defense that can protect it from one attack. If a player with an autovest would be attacked multiple times at once, the autovest will block a random one of the attacks among the strongest ones that it can successfully block. for only $9.99!*
